Chinese: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福
GPT: The sky may have unpredictable storms, and people may have sudden misfortunes or blessings
Google: There are unexpected changes in the weather, and people are subject to misfortunes and blessings at any time.
ILLAMA: The heavens have unknown windstorms, men have daily calamity and good fortune.

GPT: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
Google: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
ILLAMA: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

Chinese: 路遥知马力，日久见人心
GPT: The distance tests a horse's strength, and time reveals a person's heart
Google: A journey of a thousand miles tests a horse's strength; time reveals a person's heart.
ILLAMA: At a distance, you can tell the strength of the horse; after many days, you can see the character of man.

GPT: Better to be shattered like jade than to be whole like tile
Google: Better to die in glory than live in disgrace
ILLAMA: It is better to have a single grain of jade that will eventually break, rather than lose everything that is worth preserving.

GPT: Three feet of ice is not formed in a day
Google: The ice is three feet thick, it is not formed in one day
ILLAMA: A three-foot thick layer of ice does not form overnight.

GPT: Take precautions before it rains
Google: Prepare for a rainy day
ILLAMA: Before rain comes the thread of fate.

GPT: Dripping water can penetrate stone, but not in a day
Google: It takes time for a drop of water to wear away a stone.
ILLAMA: A single drop of water can penetrate a stone, it is not done in a day.

GPT: With utmost sincerity, even metal and stone can be split
Google: Sincerity can move mountains and open up new horizons
ILLAMA: With sincerity and purity, even gold can be revealed.

GPT: Water can carry a boat, but it can also overturn it
Google: Water can carry a boat, but it can also capsize it.
ILLAMA: Water can carry a boat, but also drown it.

GPT: If you do not enter the tiger's den, how will you get the tiger cub
Google: No venture, no gain.
ILLAMA: You cannot get the tiger cub unless you dare to enter its den.

GPT: Flowers do not remain red for a hundred days
Google: Flowers never last forever
ILLAMA: The flower blooms for a brief moment.

GPT: Sharpening the axe does not delay the chopping of firewood
Google: Sharpening the knife does not delay the chopping of wood
ILLAMA: Sharpening the saw does not miss cutting down the wooden worker.

GPT: Indigo comes from the blue, but it is bluer than the blue
Google: The disciple is better than the master
ILLAMA: A blue face is born of another blue, but it stands out more than another blue.

GPT: Thousands of troops are easy to get, but a good general is hard to find
Google: It is easy to get thousands of soldiers, but it is hard to get a general.
ILLAMA: An army can be easily won by a thousand men, but a single skilled general is hard to find.

GPT: To mend the sheepfold after a sheep is lost is not too late
Google: It is never too late to mend
ILLAMA: It's never too late to mend the fence after losing the sheep.

GPT: One who stays near vermilion gets stained red; one who stays near ink gets stained black
Google: He who keeps company with vermilion becomes red, and he who keeps company with ink becomes black.
ILLAMA: Those who are near something that is red will become red, and those who are near something that is black will become black.

GPT: Loss in the east may be gained in the west
Google: Lose in one place, gain in another
ILLAMA: What is lost beyond the eastern edge can be regained from the wild mulberry tree.

GPT: Good medicine tastes bitter but benefits the illness
Google: Good medicine tastes bitter but is good for the disease
ILLAMA: Bitter medicine is good for the illness.

GPT: Rivers and mountains can change, but one's nature is hard to alter
Google: It is easy to change the country, but difficult to change one's nature
ILLAMA: The territory and the castle can be easily changed, but one's nature is hard to change.

GPT: The previous generation plants trees, the later generation enjoys the shade
Google: Those who plant trees will enjoy the shade
ILLAMA: Those who plant a tree will reap its shade later.

GPT: An old steed lying in its stall still aspires to gallop a thousand miles
Google: An old horse still has ambitions to run a thousand miles
ILLAMA: An old horse hitches itself to a new cart, with the intention of going far.

GPT: Time flies like an arrow; the days and months pass like a shuttle
Google: Time flies, days and months pass by quickly
ILLAMA: Time is fleeting like an arrow, and years go by like a spindle.

GPT: A thousand troops cross a single-log bridge
Google: Thousands of troops crossing a single-plank bridge
ILLAMA: A thousand soldiers and a thousand horses cross the solitary bridge.

GPT: Drive away the tiger at the front door, but let the wolf in at the back
Google: Keep tigers out the front door, let wolves in through the back door
ILLAMA: The front gate can repel a tiger, but the back gate lets in a wolf.

GPT: A leaf in front of your eyes prevents you from seeing Mount Tai
Google: A leaf blocks the view of the mountain
ILLAMA: A single leaf obstructs my view of the majestic mountain.

GPT: The heavenly net is wide and loose, but it misses nothing
Google: The law is long and wide, nothing can escape it
ILLAMA: The heavenly net is boundless and unbroken, even if it is sparse.

GPT: Remain silent until the right moment, then amaze everyone with a single cry
Google: If you don't make a sound, you'll be amazing.
ILLAMA: If a bird doesn't sing, then nothing will happen; but if it sings, it will shock people.

GPT: A dike a thousand miles long can be destroyed by an ant's nest
Google: A thousand-mile embankment is destroyed by an ant hole
ILLAMA: A long wall can be breached by an anthill's tiny hole.

GPT: When the snipe and clam fight, the fisherman benefits
Google: When the snipe and the clam fight, the fisherman wins
ILLAMA: The heron and the crab squabble among themselves, while the fisherman benefits from it.

GPT: Jade must be carved to become a useful object
Google: If jade is not polished, it will not become a useful object.
ILLAMA: A gemstone that is not polished will not become a fine work of art.
